title: Which will decrease real output below FE

content.prompt: An economy is operating at full employment. Which of the following changes will result in a short-run equilibrium at a level of real output below the full-employment output?

choices.label: A decrease in income tax rates
A decrease in real interest rates

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
